hero.subheading: UTAN tells you not just what to do — but when it actually makes sense for your life.
hero.supporting: The Decision Engine for Meaninful Experiences.

uniqueness.heading: From Discovery to Decision
uniqueness.subheading: Most platforms stop at 'what'. UTAN answers 'when, how, and why now'.
uniqueness.pillar1_d: Matches activities to your schedule, weather, and traffic in real-time.
uniqueness.pillar2_d: Finds the ideal 'conditions window' for your energy and external factors.
uniqueness.pillar3_d: Adapts to your equipment, skill level, and unique lifestyle constraints.
uniqueness.pillar4_d: Prep checklists and effort-vs-reward clarity to ensure execution.

investor.heading: Investor Relations
investor.mission: Mission: To become Sweden's leading intelligent platform for discovery and decision intelligence.
investor.vision: Vision: A Sweden where discovering meaningful experiences is effortless and inclusive.
investor.summary: UTAN is a Decision Engine that transforms activities into smart, context-aware decisions.

value.text1: Find activities based on your interests, location, time, and real-life constraints — not endless lists.
value.text2: See availability, compare options, and book directly — without emails, calls, or confusion.
value.text3: Experiences from real local providers — cultural, educational, outdoor, and social.

families.title: Families
families.text: Plan activities that actually work for different ages and energy levels.

locals.title: Locals & New Residents
locals.text: Explore your city beyond the obvious — season by season.

visitors.title: Visitors
visitors.text: Experience Sweden through trusted local experiences.

teams.title: Teams & Groups
teams.text: Easy planning for team activities, workshops, and group bookings.

step1.title: 1. Tell us what matters
step1.text: Interests, availability, who you’re planning for.

step2.title: 2. Get relevant suggestions
step2.text: UTAN adapts recommendations to your context.

step3.title: 3. Book in one place
step3.text: Clear details, real-time availability, secure booking.

step4.title: 4. Enjoy the experience
step4.text: Reminders, directions, and everything you need — ready.

differentiation.headline: UTAN is not another activity marketplace.
differentiation.text: It’s a system designed to help people use their free time better, while helping local providers reach the right audience — at the right moment.
differentiation.bullet4: Designed for everyday use — not just special occasions

cta.headline: Be among the first to use UTAN
cta.text: Join the waitlist and help shape a better way to discover experiences in Sweden.
cta.privacy: No spam. We respect your privacy.
